quote: Rose pivoted. “Alainn, can I ask you something about ethics?” Alainn nodded, slowly. “Sure.” Rose’s inhuman eyes met hers, and she asked, “Would you die to save a million people?
quote_letters: ROSE PIVOTED ALAINN CAN I ASK YOU SOMETHING ABOUT ETHICS ALAINN NODDED SLOWLY SURE ROSES INHUMAN EYES MET HERS AND SHE ASKED WOULD YOU DIE TO SAVE A MILLION PEOPLE
